required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study Evaluating the Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of HSK3486
clinical_study.official_title: A Single-center, Open-label, Randomized, Double-crossover, Propofol-controlled, Two-stage Study Evaluating the Safety and Pharmacokinetics/Pharmacodynamics of IV Maintenance Dose After An Initial Dose and IV Single Loade Dose Plus Maintenance Dose of HSK3486 Emulsion fo Injection in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: Sichuan Haisco Pharmaceutical Group Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a Phase I, single-center, open-label, randomized,two-way crossover, propofol-controlled, two-stage study evaluating the safety and pharmacokinetics/pharmacodynamics of IV maintenance dose after an initial dose and IV single loade dose plus maintenance dose of HSK3486 emulsion for injection in healthy subjects.

primary_outcome.measure: blood pressure（systolic, diastolic and mean arterial pressure）
primary_outcome.time_frame: from the screening to 3 days post-dose
from the screening to 3 days post-dose
from the screening to 3 days post-dose
from the screening to 3 days post-dose

primary_outcome.measure: Number of patients with adverse events
primary_outcome.time_frame: from the baseline to 3 days post-dose

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until the subject is completely awakened post administration on day 1
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Richmond Agitation Sedation Scale(RASS) score

secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until the subject is completely awakened post administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: Sedation/anesthesia satisfaction, satisfaction assessment of subjects, anesthesiologists, and endoscopic physicians
secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until the subject is completely awakened post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

secondary_outcome.measure: plasma concentration at the end of infusion
secondary_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

other_outcome.measure: area under curve from time 0 to the last measurable blood sampling time (AUC0-last)
other_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

other_outcome.measure: area under curve from time 0 to infinite time (AUC0-inf)
other_outcome.time_frame: -30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1
-30 minutes before administration until 24 hours post administration on day 1

arm_group.description: First-stage: 1mg/kg/h, 0.4mg/kg/h; Second-stage:Single loading dose: 0.2mg/kg, maintenance dose: 0.35mg/kg/h,
First-stage: 5mg/kg/h, 2mg/kg/h; Second-stage:Single load ing dose: 1mg/kg, maintenance dose: 1.75mg/kg/h

intervention.description: First-stage:after an initial dose of 1mg/kg/h, If the BIS is in the range of 80 to 60 and the continuous RASS score = 3 or one time RASS score ≤ -4, the 0.4 mg/kg/h maintenance dose is administered. The total infusion time was 4h. Second-stage: a single loading dose of 0.2 mg/kg given over 1 minute, then a continuous infusion of maintenance dose 0.35 mg/kg/h for a total infusion time of 12h.

First-stage: after an initial dose of 5mg/kg/h, If the BIS is in the range of 80 to 60 and the continuous RASS score = 3 or one time RASS score ≤ -4, the 0.4 mg/kg/h maintenance dose is administered. The total infusion time was 4h. Second-stage: loading dose of 1mg/kg given over 1 minute, then a continuous infusion of maintenance dose 1.75 mg/kg/h for a total infusion time of 12h.
